snippet: Combatants for Peace, a group of individuals including many former military enemies in the Middle East, seeks solutions to the region’s agonized convulsions....
abstract: Andy Webster reviews Stephen Apkon and Andrew Young documentary film Disturbing the Peace.
lead_paragraph: Combatants for Peace, a group of individuals including many former military enemies in the Middle East, seeks solutions to the region’s agonized convulsions.

headline.main: Review: ‘Disturbing the Peace’ Profiles Israelis and Palestinians United Against Violence
headline.print_headline: Review: ‘Disturbing the Peace’ Profiles Israelis and Palestinians United Against Violence
